00023 extern   char **argv_global;

00038 /*!*****************************************************************************
00039  *******************************************************************************
00040  \note  runLWPR
00041  \date  January, 1994
00042  
00043  \remarks 
00044  
00045  entry to this evaluation program
00046  
00047  *******************************************************************************
00048  Function Parameters: [in]=input,[out]=output
00049  
00050  none
00051  
00052  ******************************************************************************/
00053 void 
00054 runLWPR()
00055 
00056 {
00057     
00058   int    i,j,k,n,rc,r;
00059   char   fname[100]="inv_dynamics2DOF\0";
00060   FILE  *in;
00061   char   ans[100]="q";
00062   char   string[100];
00063   int    rfID=1;
00064   int    index_max=0;
00065   double max_error;
00066   int    answ;
00067   int    n_proj;
00068 
00069 
00070   /* I need the filename of the script file: first check whether the
00071      user provided it in the argv_global variables */
00072 
00073   if (argc_global > 0) {
00074     in = fopen(argv_global[1],"r");
00075     if (in != NULL) {
00076       fclose(in);
00077       strcpy(fname,argv_global[1]);
00078     } else {
00079       if (!getFile(fname)) exit(-1);
00080     }
00081   } else {
00082     if (!getFile(fname)) exit(-1);
00083   }
00084 
00085   /* read the LWPR */
00086 
00087   if (!readLWPR(1,fname)) exit(-1);
00088 
00089   inp  = my_vector(1,lwprs[1].n_in_reg);
00090   outp = my_vector(1,lwprs[1].n_out);
00091   jac  = my_matrix(1,lwprs[1].n_out,1,lwprs[1].n_in_reg);
00092 
00093   vec_zero(inp);
00094 
00095   printLWPRStatistics(1);
00096 
00097   
00098  AGAIN:
00099 
00100   printf("\nFURTHER OPTIONS:\n");
00101   printf("               Write RF                      --> 1\n");
00102   printf("               Write RF with largest error   --> 2\n");
00103   printf("               Write trust RF w.larg.error   --> 3\n");
00104   printf("               Lookup query point            --> 4\n");
00105   printf("               Delete a RF                   --> 5\n");
00106   printf("               Save LWPR                     --> 6\n");
00107   printf("               Mathematica Surface           --> 7\n");
00108   printf("               Matlab Output                 --> 8\n");
00109   printf("               RBF-like data                 --> 9\n");
00110   printf("               Update NN                     --> n\n");
00111   printf("               Quit                          --> q\n");
00112   if (!get_string("                                 Input",ans,ans)) exit(-1);
00113 
00114   switch (ans[0]) {
00115 
00116   case 'q':
00117 
00118     exit(-1);
00119     break;
00120 
00121 
00122   case '1':
00123 
00124     get_int("Which RF should be written?",rfID,&rfID);
00125     if (rfID < 1 || rfID > lwprs[1].n_rf) {
00126       printf("RF ID out of range 1-%ld\n",lwprs[1].n_rf);
00127       break;
00128     }
00129     printRFStatistics(1, rfID);
00130     writeRFAscii(1,rfID,FALSE,"Debugging Output");
00131 
00132     break;
00133 
00134 
00135   case '2':
00136 
00137     max_error = -999;
00138     for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf;++i) {
00139       n_proj = lwprs[1].rfs[i].n_proj;
00140       if (lwprs[1].rfs[i].sum_error[n_proj]/lwprs[1].rfs[i].sum_weights[n_proj] 
00141           > max_error) {
00142         max_error = 
00143           lwprs[1].rfs[i].sum_error[n_proj]/lwprs[1].rfs[i].sum_weights[n_proj];
00144           index_max = i;
00145       }
00146     }
00147 
00148     writeRFAscii(1,index_max,FALSE,"Debugging Output");
00149 
00150     break;
00151 
00152 
00153   case '3':
00154 
00155     max_error = -999;
00156     for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf;++i) {
00157       if (!lwprs[1].rfs[i].trustworthy) continue;
00158       if (lwprs[1].rfs[i].sum_error[lwprs[1].rfs[i].n_proj] > max_error) {
00159         max_error = lwprs[1].rfs[i].sum_error[lwprs[1].rfs[i].n_proj];
00160         index_max = i;
00161       }
00162     }
00163 
00164     writeRFAscii(1,index_max,FALSE,"Debugging Output");
00165 
00166     break;
00167 
00168   case '4':
00169 
00170     if (lwprs[1].n_in_reg != lwprs[1].n_in_w) {
00171       printf("Inputs for regression and weighting need to be the same!\n");
00172       break;
00173     }
00174 
00175     get_double("Cutoff?",cutoff,&cutoff);
00176     get_int("Blending?",blend,&blend);
00177 
00178     for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_in_reg;++i) {
00179       sprintf(string,"%d.query input",i);
00180       get_double(string,inp[i],&inp[i]);
00181     }
00182 
00183     activation = 
00184       predictLWPROutput(1, inp, inp, cutoff, blend, outp, &i);
00185 
00186     print_vec("Query Point",inp);
00187     print_vec("Prediction",outp);
00188     /* print_mat("Linear Model",jac,lwprs[1].n_out,lwprs[1].n_in); */
00189 
00190     break;
00191 
00192   case '5':
00193 
00194     if (!get_int("Which RF should be deleted?",rfID,&rfID))
00195       break;
00196     get_int("Are you sure?",0,&answ);
00197     if (answ != 1) 
00198       break;
00199 
00200     deleteRF(1,rfID);
00201 
00202     break;
00203 
00204   case '6':
00205 
00206     writeLWPR(1);
00207 
00208     break;
00209 
00210   case '7':
00211 
00212     if (lwprs[1].n_in_reg != lwprs[1].n_in_w) {
00213       printf("Inputs for regression and weighting need to be the same!\n");
00214       break;
00215     }
00216 
00217 
00218     if (lwprs[1].n_in_w==2) {
00219       generateMathematicaSurf();
00220     }
00221 
00222     break;
00223 
00224   case '8':
00225 
00226     /* write diagonal of distance metric */
00227     get_int("Diagonal=1 or Full Distance Metric=0",1,&answ);
00228     if (answ)
00229       in = fopen("Ddiag.data","w");
00230     else
00231       in = fopen("D.data","w");
00232 
00233     if (in != NULL ) {
00234       for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf;++i) {
00235         for (j=1; j<=lwprs[1].n_in_w; ++j) {
00236           if (answ) {
00237             fprintf(in,"%f ",lwprs[1].rfs[i].D[j][j]);
00238           } else {
00239             for (r=1; r<=lwprs[1].n_in_w; ++r)
00240               fprintf(in,"%f ",lwprs[1].rfs[i].D[j][r]);              
00241             fprintf(in,"\n");
00242           }
00243         }
00244         fprintf(in,"\n");
00245       }
00246     }
00247     fclose(in);
00248     
00249     /* write all the projections */
00250     in = fopen("W.data","w");
00251     if (in != NULL ) {
00252       for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf;++i) {
00253         for (r=1; r<=lwprs[1].rfs[i].n_proj; ++r) {
00254           for (j=1; j<=lwprs[1].n_in_reg; ++j) {
00255             fprintf(in,"%f ",lwprs[1].rfs[i].W[r][j]);
00256           }
00257           fprintf(in,"\n");
00258         }
00259         fprintf(in,"\n");
00260       }
00261     }
00262     fclose(in);
00263     
00264     /* write all the input space projections */
00265     in = fopen("U.data","w");
00266     if (in != NULL ) {
00267       for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf;++i) {
00268         for (r=1; r<=lwprs[1].rfs[i].n_proj; ++r) {
00269           for (j=1; j<=lwprs[1].n_in_reg; ++j) {
00270             fprintf(in,"%f ",lwprs[1].rfs[i].U[r][j]);
00271           }
00272           fprintf(in,"\n");
00273         }
00274         fprintf(in,"\n");
00275       }
00276     }
00277     fclose(in);
00278     
00279     /* write all regression coefficients */
00280     in = fopen("B.data","w");
00281     if (in != NULL ) {
00282       for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf;++i) {
00283         for (j=1; j<=lwprs[1].n_out; ++j) {
00284           for (r=1; r<=lwprs[1].rfs[i].n_proj; ++r) {
00285             fprintf(in,"%f ",lwprs[1].rfs[i].B[r][j]);
00286           }
00287           fprintf(in,"\n");
00288         }
00289         fprintf(in,"\n");
00290       }
00291     }
00292     fclose(in);
00293     
00294     /* write all centers */
00295     in = fopen("C.data","w");
00296     if (in != NULL ) {
00297       for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf;++i) {
00298         for (j=1; j<=lwprs[1].n_in_w; ++j) {
00299           fprintf(in,"%f ",lwprs[1].rfs[i].c[j]);
00300         }
00301         fprintf(in,"\n");
00302       }
00303     }
00304     fclose(in);
00305     
00306     
00307     break;
00308 
00309   case '9':
00310 
00311     if (lwprs[1].n_in_reg != lwprs[1].n_in_w) {
00312       printf("Inputs for regression and weighting need to be the same!\n");
00313       break;
00314     }
00315 
00316     generateRBFData();
00317     
00318     break;
00319 
00320   case 'n':
00321 
00322     checkLWPRNN(1);
00323     break;
00324 
00325   default:
00326 
00327     break;
00328 
00329   }
00330 
00331   goto AGAIN;
00332     
00333 }
00334 
00335 /*!*****************************************************************************
00336  *******************************************************************************
00337  \note  generateMathematicaSurf
00338  \date  January, 19941994
00339  
00340  \remarks 
00341  
00342   for 2D functions, generates polygons for display with mathematica
00343  
00344  *******************************************************************************
00345  Function Parameters: [in]=input,[out]=output
00346  
00347  none
00348  
00349  ******************************************************************************/
00350 void 
00351 generateMathematicaSurf() 
00352 
00353 {
00354   int     i,j,k,m,o;
00355   double *input;
00356   double *output;
00357   double**mat;
00358   FILE   *out;
00359   int     n_patch[10];
00360   double *inc;
00361   char    string[100];
00362   int     n_in, n_out;
00363   double *maxs, *mins;
00364   int     rfID;
00365 
00366 
00367   strcpy(string,lwprs[1].lwpr_name);
00368   n_in = lwprs[1].n_in_w;
00369   n_out = lwprs[1].n_out;
00370 
00371   input  = my_vector(1,n_in);
00372   output = my_vector(1,n_out);
00373   maxs   = my_vector(1,n_in);
00374   mins   = my_vector(1,n_in);
00375   inc    = my_vector(1,n_in);
00376 
00377   get_int("Number of Steps x",40.,&n_patch[1]);
00378   get_int("Number of Steps y",40.,&n_patch[2]);
00379   mat     = my_matrix(0,n_patch[1],0,n_patch[2]);
00380 
00381   for (i=1; i<=n_in; ++i) {
00382     sprintf(string,"Max. of %d.dim",i);
00383     maxs[i] = 1;
00384     get_double(string,maxs[i],&maxs[i]);
00385     sprintf(string,"Min. of %d.dim",i);
00386     mins[i] = -1;
00387     get_double(string,mins[i],&mins[i]);
00388     printf("\n");
00389     inc[i] = (maxs[i]-mins[i])/(double)n_patch[i];
00390   }
00391 
00392 
00393   for (i=0; i<=n_patch[1]; ++i) {
00394     for (j=0; j<=n_patch[2]; ++j) {
00395     
00396       input[1] = i*inc[1] + mins[1];
00397       input[2] = j*inc[2] + mins[2];
00398       
00399       if (predictLWPROutput(1, input, input, 0.001, TRUE, output,&rfID)) {
00400           mat[i][j] = output[1];
00401       } else {
00402         mat[i][j] = 0;
00403       }
00404     }
00405   }
00406 
00407   out = fopen("mathematica.data","w");
00408 
00409   for (i=0; i<n_patch[1]; ++i) {
00410     for (j=0; j<n_patch[2]; ++j) {
00411        
00412       fprintf(out,"Polygon[{{%f,%f,%f},",
00413               i*inc[1]+ mins[1],j*inc[2]+mins[2],mat[i][j]);
00414       fprintf(out,"{%f,%f,%f},",
00415               (i+1)*inc[1]+ mins[1],j*inc[2]+mins[2],mat[i+1][j]);
00416       fprintf(out,"{%f,%f,%f},",
00417               (i+1)*inc[1]+ mins[1],(j+1)*inc[2]+mins[2],mat[i+1][j+1]);
00418       fprintf(out,"{%f,%f,%f},",
00419               (i)*inc[1]+ mins[1],(j+1)*inc[2]+mins[2],mat[i][j+1]);
00420       fprintf(out,"{%f,%f,%f}}]\n",
00421                 i*inc[1]+ mins[1],j*inc[2]+mins[2],mat[i][j]);
00422     }
00423   }
00424 
00425   fclose(out);
00426 
00427   exit(1);
00428 }
00429 /*!*****************************************************************************
00430  *******************************************************************************
00431  \note  generateRBFData
00432  \date  August 1996
00433  
00434  \remarks 
00435  
00436   runs LWPR on a particular test data set, and generates a data set of
00437   weighted predictions of all RFs which can be used in a subsequent
00438   RBF-like net
00439  
00440  *******************************************************************************
00441  Function Parameters: [in]=input,[out]=output
00442  
00443  none
00444  
00445  ******************************************************************************/
00446 void 
00447 generateRBFData() 
00448 
00449 {
00450 
00451   FILE *in,*out;
00452   int   i,j,rc=0;
00453   char  fname[100];
00454   double w;
00455   double sum_w;
00456 
00457   if (!getFile(fname))
00458     return;
00459 
00460   in = fopen(fname,"r");
00461   sprintf(fname,"%s.rbf",fname);
00462   out = fopen(fname,"w");
00463 
00464   for (;;) {
00465 
00466     for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_in_w; ++i) {
00467       rc = fscanf(in,"%lf",&inp[i]);
00468       if (rc == EOF)
00469         break;
00470     }
00471     if (rc == EOF)
00472       break;
00473 
00474     for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_out; ++i) {
00475       rc = fscanf(in,"%lf",&outp[i]);
00476       if (rc == EOF)
00477         break;
00478     }
00479     if (rc == EOF)
00480       break;
00481 
00482 
00483     sum_w = 0;
00484     for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf; ++i) {
00485       sum_w += predictLWPROutputRF(1, inp, inp, i, outp);
00486     }
00487     for (i=1; i<=lwprs[1].n_rf; ++i) {
00488       w = predictLWPROutputRF(1, inp, inp, i, outp);
00489       fprintf(out,"%f ",w*outp[1]/sum_w);
00490     }
00491     fprintf(out,"\n");
00492 
00493   }
00494 
00495   fclose(in);
00496   fclose(out);
00497 
00498 }
